 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架

utility
类 Action

java.lang.Object
  utility.Action

public class Action
extends java.lang.Object

Action class record the action player or AI agent take consists of two integer variables

作者：
yuanduochen

构造方法摘要
Action(int r, int c)
          construct the Action
 
方法摘要
 int getColunm()
          get the column of the action
 int getRow()
          get the row of the action
 void setColunm(int colunm)
          set the column of the action
 void setRow(int row)
          set the row of the action
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Action

              int c)
construct the Action

参数：
r - row of the action
c - column of the action
